entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
